subject: re: fedora livecd
body:
I figure a kickstart file will likely end up being the best way to go on 
this.  Fortunately, using a boot: line like linux ks=floppy under fedora 
at least is supposed to find ks.cfg on the floppy drive and run using 
instructions from that file.  It might even be worth trying it with 
ubuntu.
